description: Hashim Thaci says accusations by international prosecutors are an attempt to rewrite Kosovo's history.
title: Kosovo president rejects war crimes indictment as 'attempt to rewrite history'
title_page: Kosovo president rejects war crimes indictment as 'attempt to rewrite history' - BBC News
maintext: "The indictment is only an accusation. It is the result of a lengthy investigation and reflects the SPO's determination that it can prove all of the charges beyond a reasonable doubt," it said.
